post.body: Just got to know zeronet. How exactly does for example peeper.bit work? Is there a way to easily monitor the seeding?
Day 2 of my zeronet experience. Got some decent conversations going on on the different variants of messaging boards.

Really digging premake5. Been experimenting with a real time framework that I'm working where I can easily build a game without needing to recompile engine code. 

premake5 makes it so easy to do. I can now automatically regenerate project files when I'm compiling in visual studios by just defining a custom project with custom build commands!

I probably should start testing it in a linux environment and implement the linux specific parts although I will get so distracted by creating the best setup on linux that I probably won't spend anytime actually implementing the code.

comment.body: @Peeper: Every site is immediately put into my connected sites and seeded? Hm not sure if I like this behaviour.
Ha, one site already hit a 10MB size limit. Seems sensible.
